#Question 1

##Read and clean the Mr. Trashwheel sheet

```{r}

library(readxl)
trash_data = read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-7-2020-2.xlsx",
                        sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
                        skip = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select("dumpster":"homes_powered") %>%
  drop_na(dumpster) %>%
   mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls, 0))
